system.sustained: The Psyker touches a willing, living target (including themselves) that has suffered damage, and makes a Focus Power Test. The Psyker removes 1d5+Psy Rating Damage taken, +2 per Degree of Success. However the target immediately gains a number of corruption points equal to the amount of damage removed. This technique does not work on Untouchables, Machines, or non-living creatures such as Daemons.
